Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Cup
Description: Cup with a vertical wall in its upper section and slightly carinated body with a convex wall in its lower section. The small round base is relatively high. The pronounced flat lip is underlined. Two vestigial handles have been attatched below the lip (serving here not as actual handles but as decorative elements).
